name: Dignitek Health
overview:
Dignitek is lead by a team of devoted physicians and clinical researchers whom are all dedicated to making better informed decisions that reflect our deep rooted respect for mankind and the well being of our clients, community, and planet. Dignitek is concerned about the unsustainable rising costs of health care and believes the best way reduce costs is to improve patient understanding and knowledge about care plan, disease management, and care plan compliance.

Innovation and technological development through mobile interfaces is one key to the economic success of Dignitek, and innovation it’s the core of our initiative. We understand that good health begins with a good relationship with your physician and adhering to the physicians recommend plan of care.
